import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCheck, faTimes } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import Menu from './Menu' import { RestaurantApi } from '../auth/restaurant.api' import { RestaurantDto } from '../auth/dto/restaurant.dto' import { Simulate } from 'react-dom/test-utils' const Card: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const [restaurants, setRestaurants] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchAll() { const resp = await RestaurantApi.getAll() setRestaurants(resp) } fetchAll() }, []) return (

Places

{restaurants.map((restaurant) => (

{restaurant.name}

{restaurant.phone}
{restaurant.distance}
))}
) } export default Card
